title: showdown shop bug?

embed.description: Image Screen Shot 2017 12 17 at 11 49 22 am hosted in imgbb.com

body: for the showdown shop instead of reducing the price of the skins it has actually made it for expensive then tried to add like 20% off yet its still very expensive is thee any way I can fix this I want to buy some skins :/

replies.body:
Submit a support ticket and they should be able to work something out with you :)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
